name: ThinkTANK Advertising & Design, Inc.
description:
ThinkTANK Advertising & Design was founded in 2001, becoming Western Canada’s largest alternative advertising company. We offer expertise in online, outdoor and experiential marketing including online presence management mobile & digital billboards, and creative design. At ThinkTANK, we pride ourselves on being transparent by removing the fluff and creating work that sells.
Our Three step process includes: Generating deliverables, Measuring effectiveness and, Refining strategies to generate more effective results.
The motto at ThinkTANK is “Inspire action with engaging communication”. It’s something we live by everyday to the benefit of our clients and their customers.
Online: Website design, Digital Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO) Social media, & Search Marketing (Google+ My Business & Google Certified Partner)
Outdoor: Digital, Mobile & Static billboards, signage strategies, & Large format printing
Marketing: Experiential event marketing - street teams - Creative services - Logo design, branding strategies and Design services
